description:
Provides an ALIKAFKA instance resource.

-> **NOTE:** Available in 1.59.0+

-> **NOTE:** ALIKAFKA instance resource only support create post pay instance. Creation or modification may took about 10-40 minutes.

-> **NOTE:** Only the following regions support create alikafka pre paid instance.
[`cn-hangzhou`,`cn-beijing`,`cn-shenzhen`,`cn-shanghai`,`cn-qingdao`,`cn-hongkong`,`cn-huhehaote`,`cn-zhangjiakou`,`ap-southeast-1`,`ap-south-1`,`ap-southeast-5`]

-> **NOTE:** Only the following regions support create alikafka post paid instance.
[`cn-hangzhou`,`cn-beijing`,`cn-shenzhen`,`cn-shanghai`,`cn-qingdao`,`cn-hongkong`,`cn-huhehaote`,`cn-zhangjiakou`,`ap-southeast-1`]

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

DeployType.description: The deploy type of the instance. Currently only support two deploy type, 4: eip/vpc instance, 5: vpc instance.

DiskSize.description: The disk size of the instance. When modify this value, it only support adjust to a greater value.

DiskType.description: The disk type of the instance. 0: efficient cloud disk , 1: SSD.

EipMax.description: The max bandwidth of the instance. When modify this value, it only support adjust to a greater value.

IoMax.description: The max value of io of the instance. When modify this value, it only support adjust to a greater value.

Name.description: Name of your Kafka instance. The length should between 3 and 64 characters. If not set, will use instance id as instance name.

PaidType.description: The paid type of the instance. Support two type, "PrePaid": pre paid type instance, "PostPaid": post paid type instance. Default is PostPaid. When modify this value, it only support adjust from post pay to pre pay.

SpecType.description: The spec type of the instance. Support two type, "normal": normal version instance, "professional": professional version instance. Default is normal. When modify this value, it only support adjust from normal to professional. Note only pre paid type instance support professional specific type.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

TopicQuota.description: The max num of topic can be create of the instance. When modify this value, it only adjust to a greater value.

VswitchId.description: The ID of attaching vswitch to instance.
